text: Very good selections of craft beer. It is always great to have a good IPA in a frozen pint glass.
Chilled IPA good to pair with all hawker dishes. Can request for chill mug every 30min.

The best beer I had in Singapore. Craft IPA.
They serve glasses very cold, which Japanese prefers.

[2023-04-01, $13/pint]

had the wheat beer and was honestly not a fan. not as malty as I'd like and was more sour than most, had a banana note as advertised which was interesting.

Didn't know there is such a shop in Newton circus! The owner (just guessing he is the owner) really puts a lot of effort to pull the beer, to balance the beer and foam. First time I tabao draught beer, covid phase 2 :s I ordered the IPA, happy with it. Went back a 3rd time but the shop was not opened :( will definitely buy again if the shop is open!
During my second visit, I asked if they sell sampler, unfortunately no
